seller.name: E&I Cooperative Services
seller.valueProposition: Comprehensive retention platform that identifies at-risk students, enables proactive intervention, and improves completion rates through data-driven insights and personalized support pathways

buyer.name: Western Governors University
characteristics: One of largest universities in the US
Mission: Expanding access to higher education

members.name: Scott D. Pulsipher
members.title: President and Chief Executive Officer
members.roleReasoning: CEO with final authority on major strategic investments. A $1M retention solution requires C-suite approval. Scott has led WGU since 2016, overseeing growth to 175K+ students.

painPoints.title: Student Completion Rates
painPoints.description: Online universities face scrutiny over completion rates. Improving retention directly impacts WGU's reputation and accreditation standing.
painPoints.impact: Every 1% improvement in retention = thousands more graduates and millions in tuition revenue.

painPoints.title: Scaling Student Support
painPoints.description: With 175K+ students, traditional advising models don't scale. Need technology-enabled support.
painPoints.impact: Manual processes limit growth and personalization.

members.name: Dr. Courtney Hills McBeth
members.title: Chief Academic Officer and Provost
members.roleReasoning: Provost overseeing all academic programs and curriculum. Retention directly impacts academic outcomes. Joined WGU January 2024 from Strada Education Foundation where she focused on education-workforce transformation. PhD from UPenn.

painPoints.title: Academic Quality vs. Accessibility
painPoints.description: Balancing open access mission with academic rigor. Need data to identify where students struggle.
painPoints.impact: Without intervention tools, at-risk students fall through the cracks.

painPoints.title: Competency-Based Progression Tracking
painPoints.description: CBE model requires sophisticated tracking of student progress. Traditional LMS may not capture early warning signs.
painPoints.impact: Delayed intervention leads to higher dropout rates.

members.name: Debbie Fowler
members.title: Senior Vice President of Academic Delivery
members.roleReasoning: Formerly SVP Student Success, now SVP Academic Delivery overseeing 2,900 faculty/staff supporting 175K students. 30+ years experience. JD from USD. Executive Sponsor of NSLS. Key champion who owns student success metrics.

painPoints.title: Faculty/Staff to Student Ratio
painPoints.description: With 175K students and 2,900 faculty/staff, need technology to identify which students need intervention.
painPoints.impact: Cannot provide personalized support at scale without predictive analytics.

painPoints.title: Systemic Barriers to Completion
painPoints.description: Debbie champions removing barriers to education. Needs tools to identify and address obstacles.
painPoints.impact: Financial, personal, and academic barriers cause preventable dropouts.

members.name: Sarah DeMark
members.title: Vice Provost, Workforce Intelligence and Credential Integrity
members.roleReasoning: Focuses on aligning program outcomes with employer needs. Retention data informs program quality and workforce relevance.

painPoints.title: Program-to-Workforce Alignment
painPoints.description: Need data on which programs have retention issues that may indicate curriculum misalignment.
painPoints.impact: Poor retention in specific programs signals need for curriculum updates.

members.name: CFO/VP Finance
members.title: Chief Financial Officer
members.roleReasoning: For a ~$1M investment, CFO approval is required. Will scrutinize ROI and total cost of ownership.

painPoints.title: ROI Justification
painPoints.description: $1M investment requires clear ROI. Retention improvements directly impact tuition revenue.
painPoints.impact: Each retained student = ~$7,000-15,000 in annual tuition.

painPoints.title: Budget Cycle Alignment
painPoints.description: Major purchases must align with fiscal year planning.

members.name: VP Enrollment Management
members.title: Vice President of Enrollment Management
members.roleReasoning: Enrollment and retention are interconnected. VP Enrollment cares about student lifecycle from admission to completion.

painPoints.title: Enrollment-to-Completion Pipeline
painPoints.description: High enrollment means nothing if students don't persist. Need visibility into retention trends.
painPoints.impact: Enrollment targets are meaningless without retention.

members.name: CIO/VP Technology
members.title: Chief Information Officer
members.roleReasoning: Technology integration gatekeeper. Retention solution must integrate with WGU's SIS, LMS, and data systems.

painPoints.title: System Integration Complexity
painPoints.description: New solutions must integrate with existing tech stack. WGU runs on custom CBE platform.

painPoints.title: Data Security & Privacy
painPoints.description: Student data requires FERPA compliance and robust security.
painPoints.impact: Security concerns can block or delay deals.
